value.title: KenSci
value.excerpt: Digital primary care for less. Get answers and chat with a doctor for less than a co-pay without leaving your couch.
value.name: KenSci
value.overview: Digital primary care for less. Get answers and chat with a doctor for less than a co-pay without leaving your couch.

value.title: Megvii
value.excerpt: MEGVII is a world-class AI company with core competencies in deep learning. Founded in Beijing in 2011 by Yin Qi, Tang Wenbin and Yang Mu, three Tsinghua University graduates who studied under the Turing-prize winning Chinese computer scientist and computational theorist Andrew Chi-Chih Yao, MEGVII is a pioneer in applying AI technology and computer vision algorithms to Internet of Things (IoT) use cases. The Company’s mission is to use innovative AI technology to deliver value to customers and to benefit the society as a whole.
value.name: Megvii
otherNames: 北京旷视科技有限公司

value.title: Narrative Science
value.excerpt: Narrative Science creates software that writes stories from data to drive understanding and results. Powered by artificial intelligence, our technology automatically turns data into easy-to-understand reports, transforms statistics into stories, and converts numbers into knowledge.
value.name: Narrative Science

value.title: SenseTime
value.excerpt: SenseTime is a global company focused on developing innovative AI technologies that positively contribute to economies, society and humanity.
value.name: SenseTime
value.overview: SenseTime is a global company focused on developing innovative AI technologies that positively contribute to economies, society and humanity.

value.title: Socure
value.excerpt: Socure provides a real-time predictive analytics platform that combines the newest forms of machine learning and artificial intelligence with digital, offline and social identity data to deliver the most accurate and robust KYC, identity verification and fraud risk prediction solution in the market.
value.name: Socure
value.overview: Socure provides a real-time predictive analytics platform that combines the newest forms of machine learning and artificial intelligence with digital, offline and social identity data to deliver the most accurate and robust KYC, identity verification and fraud risk prediction solution in the market.

value.title: SparkCognition
value.excerpt: SparkCognition builds leading artificial intelligence solutions to advance the most important interests of society. We help customers analyze complex data, empower decision making, and transform human and industrial productivity with award-winning machine learning technology and expert teams focused on defense, IIoT, and finance.
value.name: SparkCognition
value.overview: SparkCognition builds leading artificial intelligence solutions to advance the most important interests of society. value.title: Kabbage
value.excerpt: Kabbage Inc., headquartered in Atlanta, has pioneered the first financial services data and technology platform to provide fully automated funding to small businesses in minutes. Kabbage leverages data generated through business activity such as accounting data, online sales, shipping and dozens of other sources to understand performance and deliver fast, flexible funding in real time. In just a few years, Kabbage has become the number one online provider of working capital to small businesses in the United States and UK.
